Name: Debt - Chasing Treasure
About the game: WARNING This game may trigger seizures in people with photosensitive epilepsy. It is left to the discretion of the player. IMPORTANT The game focuses on exploration and leaves you in the middle of a tension. The game's story can be quite distracting as it is supported by lights and loud sounds. Consider that it gives you a lot of fear and is a difficult game. DEBT is a first-person psychological horror, action, adventure, survival horror game. ENVIRONMENT The game starts with the character finding cursed gold in the mine he entered due to debts. While our character is looking for the exit from the mine by eliminating the question marks, he finds himself in the middle of an adventure in which there are curses, fears and events that he cannot understand. Subject Owen, whose life is in a deadlock due to his debts, decides to enter the gold mine where treasure rumors arise. does not return. Not knowing what his decisions will lead to, Owen will fight for the hardest survival of his life. You will see blood and weapons in this adventure. If you are sensitive, please heed the warnings. ATTENTION DEBT game contains loud noise, tension, blood, weapons and jumping.
